article_title: Director of policy affairs, exchange solutions
article_text:
John Barkett Director of policy affairs, exchange solutions

Even though most employers have come to terms with the Affordable Care Act, there are still changes they would like to see, says Willis Towers Watson’s John Barkett, including a repeal of the Cadillac tax.

article_metadata.description: John Barkett is director of policy affairs, exchange solutions, at Willis Towers Watson.
